segments.text: How do you feel about that restaurant ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: What did you dislike the most ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I don't think that they had their act together . They didn't seem well prepared .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Did you think that the food was any good ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I wasn't all that impressed by the food .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: The service certainly could have been better .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: The service did not help the situation .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Is this a restaurant that you want to come back to ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I am not interested in trying this restaurant again .
segments.speaker: S2
